categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: This series of various consecutive wars and conflicts occurred between the Psadan and the Myneyrsh, two native species of the planet Wayland, before and into the Galactic Republic's Expansionist Era. The cycle of violence would end somewhere during that time when Human colonists crash-landed on the planet. They lorded over the two primitive species with their blasters. After a few generations, the Humans' power packs faded and, without their technological weaponry, were forced to take up bows to defend themselves. The three-sided conflict was equalized. Eventually, the three groups would achieve peace.
